exclamation.description: (especially in biblical, Judaic, and Christian use) used to express adoration, praise, or joy.
examples: “Hosanna, blessed is he who comes in the name of the Lord.“

noun.description: An expression of adoration, praise, or joy.
examples: the soundtrack evoked passionate hosannas from some critics

origin: Old English, via late Latin from Greek hōsanna, from Rabbinical Hebrew hōšanā, abbreviation of biblical hōšīā-nnā save, we pray (Ps. 118:25).
